backend-jd: Develop, test, and maintain robust backend systems and APIs to support frontend applications.
Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Optimize application performance and scalability by implementing efficient data storage and retrieval methods.
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following best practices and coding standards.
Troubleshoot and debug issues reported by users or QA team members to ensure smooth operation of applications.
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends to continuously improve backend development processes.
frontend-js: Develop, test, and maintain frontend application logic to ensure functionality and performance.
Collaborate with designers and backend developers to implement user interfaces and integrate frontend logic with backend systems.
Write clean, efficient, and well-structured code using frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implement frontend logic and algorithms to support dynamic user interactions and data manipulation.
Optimize application performance and responsiveness by identifying and resolving frontend bottlenecks.
Stay informed about industry trends and best practices in frontend development to continuously improve coding standards and practices.
devops-js: Assist in the setup, configuration, and maintenance of Docker containers and Kubernetes clusters.
Support the development and deployment of microservices-based applications using containerization technologies.
Collaborate with the development team to streamline the CI/CD pipeline and automate deployment processes.
Monitor and troubleshoot containerized applications to ensure availability, performance, and scalability.
Participate in testing and validation of infrastructure changes and updates.
Document procedures, configurations, and best practices for Docker and Kubernetes environments.
